comments.text:
Created attachment 574617
Debug output

(Please help me file this where it belongs.)

Clean profile, today's Nightly on Mac OS X 10.6.8.  Trying to open the following URL causes the CPU usage to spike to 100% where it stays forever.

http://pl.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Plik%3AMoscow_Metro%2C_Kievskaya_station.jpg&filetimestamp=20050127160901

No crash, no nothing.  I tried a debug build (from today's source) and didn't see anything suspicious.  I'm no expert though, so attached is the terminal output from the debug build.

The memory usage seems OK, at around 140 MB.

I tested on Mac OS X 10.7 and I couldn't reproduce.

I'll be happy to provide more information to help you debug this.
